steps.text: The baker greets you warmly. "I'd love to serve you some {{baked_item}}, but I'm all out of flour. Could you help me?"
The baker smiles gratefully. 'Wonderful! Please visit the market and get some flour.'
steps.log: Agreed to fetch flour for the baker

steps.text: The baker is delighted to see you return, but is disapointed to see you don't have any flour.
The baker is delighted to see you return with flour. 'Thank you! Here's some silver for your trouble.'
The baker hands you a silver coin and smiles warmly.
steps.log: Delivered flour to baker and earned silver
